title: The Fearless Ferret
description: A new kind of caped crusading duo. The Fearless Ferret and Wonder Weasel protect the city from all kinds of bad guys.
altHero: two superheroes: a man in a ferret costume and a caped weasel
alt1: Timothy North approaches a ferret head bust
alt2: Fearless Ferret punches a skunk villain with a “Sock!”
alt3: Wonder Weasel punches a green villain with a “Pow!”
alt4: Fearless Ferret and Wonder Weasel on a rooftop
